<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/me/following"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the current user's followed artists.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-follow-read**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"type","description":"The ID type- currently only artist is supported.\n\n**Allowed values:** \"artist\"\n\n**Example:** type=artist","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"artist"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
